document_data.name: Water Wyvern
document_data.mainbody: '''''Water wyvern''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[conjuration]] [[spell]] from the [[elemental water sphere]] that animated water as the caster desired.
document_data.Effects: The [[wyvern]]-like mass of water was twice the caster's body volume. It could "bite" during combat with crushing water and could even be ridden like a mount by the caster.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s an animal tooth and three scales from an aquatic creature to cast.
document_data.History: ''Water wyvern'' was granted to [[priest]]s of [[Umberlee]], the Bitch Queen.
